availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William David Boswell (Lexington, Fayette County, Kentucky, attorney and commissioner)

body.p: Lexington, Fayette County, Kentucky, attorney and commissioner. Kentucky, native. Attorney in 1864. Fayette County Commissioner in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Find A Grave, William David Boswell (August 10, 1829-February 15, 1888), Find A Grave Memorial #100461377, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/100461377 (accessed June 17, 2019).
Williams & Co., Williams' Lexington City Directory, for 1864-5, (Lexington, KY, 1864), 11, 31.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, Lexington, p. 193B
